detail_desc: Slim-fit jeans in stretch, supersoft satin with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and sparkly stone press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Fitted Henley top in soft cotton jersey with a low-cut neckline, button placket and long sleeves.
Trainers with mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Blouse in a slub-weave viscose blend containing some linen. Square neckline, buttons down the front and short puff sleeves with elastication over the shoulders. Gently shaping seams front and back and a seam at the waist.
Wide, slightly shorter jumper in a cashmere knit with a deep V neck, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves that taper to the cuffs. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with padded cups that lift and shape while providing good support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Medium support.
Ribbed top in an airy viscose blend with a V-neck, lacing at the front, dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Pre-tied bow tie in woven fabric with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back. Width 8 cm.
Short-sleeved top in jersey made from an organic cotton blend in a wide, slightly shorter style.

Sports bra in ribbed, fast-drying functional fabric. Lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and a racer back. Light support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. The polyamide content of the bra is recycled.
Short, one-shoulder blouse in airy, patterned chiffon with elastication and two flounces at the top and an elasticated hem. Unlined.
Short-sleeved football shirt in printed, fast-drying functional fabric with press-studs at the back.
Skirt in washed denim with front pockets and buttons down the front.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with a print motif and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Off-the-shoulder playsuit in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with elastication at the top and 3/4-length raglan sleeves with ties. Elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
Short top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an unlined, drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs, and a lace-trimmed hem.
Oversized lace shirt with a pointed collar and buttons down the front. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, two open chest pockets, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details. High waist and raw-edge, cut-off hems. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Sleeveless, fitted, calf-length dress in stretch denim with wide shoulder straps, off-centre buttons down the front and a seam at the waist.
Knee-length dress in sturdy jacquard-knit jersey with short cap sleeves and a concealed zip at the back. Gently tapered waist with a seam, and a flared skirt with pleats at the front for added width.
Trousers in a patterned weave with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and straight, wide legs.
Jacket in soft faux shearling with imitation leather details. Collar, zip down the front and zipped, diagonal front pockets. Unlined.
Skirt in jersey with contrasting colour trims, an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides. The cotton content of the skirt is organic.
Short shorts in a viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and gently rounded hems with short slits in the sides.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and ribbed hems.
Knee-length, fitted dress in lace with a deep V-neck front and back, long sleeves, a seam at the waist and a scalloped trim around the neckline and hem. Partly lined.
Jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Shawl collar, concealed pockets in the side seams, 3/4-length sleeves with gathers at the cuffs, and a tie belt at the waist. No fasteners. Lined.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, extended waistband with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a zip fly. Discreet pockets in the side seams, fake back pockets and tapered legs with creases. The pocket linings are made from recycled polyester.
Long top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with a zip fly, diagonal side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif and lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Blouse in a soft weave with a small collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Metal earrings with plastic beads. Length 7 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Strapless balconette bra in microfibre with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Silicone trim and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Shoulder straps included.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and legs with creases.
Trousers in soft viscose jersey with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Short dress in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the chest, short sleeves and short slits at the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Knee-length dress in a patterned weave with a wide neckline, opening with a button at the back of the neck, 3/4-length sleeves and detachable tie belt. Lined.

Handbag accessory with a metal chain and carabiner hook, and an imitation leather pendant in the shape of a backpack. The backpack has a zip at the top, faux fur pompom and small, zipped outer compartment. Size approx. 3x7x9 cm.
Sheer jersey top in a narrow cut at the top with lace at the back, narrow shoulder straps and an opening with a button at the back of the neck.
Short, sleeveless dress in jersey with decorative lace trims at the top, around the armholes and at the waist. Concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Cardigan in a soft fine knit with an embroidered motif on the chest and a round neckline. Buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Padded gilet in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, zip down the front and welt side pockets with a press-stud. Lined. Polyester filling.
Knee-length dress in slub cotton jersey with a V-neck, butterfly sleeves and a gathered, elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details. Extra-high waist, a button fly and gently tapered legs with raw-edge hems.
Fitted, double-breasted jacket in a slightly stretchy weave with notch lapels, welt front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Lace body with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck, moulded cups and press-studs at the crotch.

Calf-length kaftan in a softly draping, patterned linen and viscose weave with a mandarin collar, concealed buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Long, wide raglan sleeves with pleats at the cuffs for added width, and wide, buttoned cuffs. Tapered waist with shaping seams and pleats, discreet pockets in the side seams and high slits in the sides. Unlined.

Super push-up lace bra with decorative straps at the front and underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Jersey body in a loose fit at the top with notch lapels and a sewn-in wrapover at the front. Dropped shoulders, long, tapered sleeves, a seam at the waist and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide, drawstring waistband and cuffed hems.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Leotard in glossy jersey with double, crossed straps at the back, long sleeves and a lined gusset.
Slightly shorter, long-sleeved top in jersey crêpe made from a viscose blend with a round neckline, an opening at the back and a double-layered panel at the hem with ties at the back.
Trainers in cotton canvas with elastic gores in the sides, a padded edge and a small loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh sections, a hood, short cap sleeves and a drawstring at the hem.
Fully lined, patterned bikini. Triangle top with narrow shoulder straps that are braided together at the back of the neck, and a plastic fastener at the back.
Faux fur jacket with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front and pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, heart-shaped front pockets, regular back pockets and narrow hems.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back in ventilating mesh and a wide elasticated hem. Medium support.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Shorts in soft organic cotton slub jersey with an elasticated waist and fake fly with decorative buttons. Diagonal side pockets and a back pocket.
Cotton jersey T-shirt with reversible sequins on the front and short slits in the sides.
Trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets and tapered legs.
Shorts in a woven cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, zip fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket.
Short, smocked top in cotton jersey with wide shoulder straps and a flounce at the top and hem.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust. Narrow, concealed elastication at the top and covered elastication at the hem. Medium support. The polyester content of the bra’s outer fabric and lining is recycled.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jacket in cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and detachable tie belt at the waist. Open chest pockets, patch front pockets and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.
Velour playsuit with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck, elasticated seam at the waist and wide legs.
Jumper in soft, textured-knit cotton with visible buttons on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Pyjamas with a long-sleeved top and bottoms in soft, organic cotton pointelle. Round-necked top with a picot trim and decorative bow at the front, and a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Bottoms with covered elastication at the waist and ribbed hems.
Hipster briefs in lace and microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Imitation leather trainers with a padded edge, loop at the back, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front. Mesh linings and insoles.
Cold shoulder top in soft cotton jersey with a frill trim and long sleeves.
5-pocket jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Fitted top in airy jersey with a double-layered polo neck and long sleeves.
